description: This is a test suite for the SerperTools class, which interacts with the Serper API for search, news, scholar, and webpage scraping functionalities. The file contains mock fixtures, unit tests for initialization, API calls, error handling, and edge cases, utilizing pytest and unittest.mock.

classes.name: SerperTools
classes.description: A class that provides methods to interact with the Serper API for search, news, scholar, and webpage scraping.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Performs a search query using the Serper API and returns the raw response text or an error message.

methods.name: search_news
methods.description: Performs a news search query using the Serper API and returns the raw response text or an error message.

methods.name: search_scholar
methods.description: Performs an academic paper search using the Serper API and returns the raw response text or an error message.

methods.name: scrape_webpage
methods.description: Scrapes a webpage content via the Serper API and returns the raw response text or an error message.
